name: diffhtml
description: Easily swap out markup with an intelligent virtual dom
author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)

scripts.build-runtime: browserify -t babelify -i ./lib/util/parser.js -u ./lib/util/parser.js -s diff lib/index.js | derequire > dist/diffhtml-runtime.js
scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-runtime
scripts.build-main: browserify -t babelify -s diff lib/index.js | derequire > dist/diffhtml.js
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run karma -- --single-run
